top_comments.comment: Watched Episode 3 Lost.damn.kala ng babae nagmove on na agad c lalake and to court someone else with the flowers but it was really for her.ends up breaking up with him and being happy with her decision.On the other hand this Episode 5 naman as a guys perspective.they had an bad arguement,the guy thinks everything over thats why di sya nagrerespond sa message ni gf nya.then thinks of apologizing with flowers.ends up infront of his gfs house and see the flowers she bought for herself to feel loved because she thinks nobody will buy her flowers but her.the guy thinking someone new is courting her.he's left in pain,breaks up and as she walks away from him making her decision final.damn,poor dude.
I feel like every Zack Tabudlo song will break your heart and then make you feel a little better in the end. 😂🔥
